meanings.definition: The act of predicting or warning of impending disaster or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: Her constant doomsaying about the weather made everyone anxious.
meanings.sent2: The doomsaying of the old sailor turned out to be true as the storm hit the coast.
meanings.sent3: Despite his doomsaying, the picnic turned out to be a fun and sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The doomsaying of the fortune teller seemed to hang in the air like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The doomsaying of the scientist was proven wrong when the experiment succeeded.
